item.title: Refik Anadol
item.description: Last week’s speaker in the Penny Stamps Speaker Series was Refik Anadol, one of the most successful artists working primarily with AI, data, and visualization. Over a decade or so, Anadol has produced work in collaboration with organizations and venues like the LA Philharmonic, Gaudi’s Casa Batll√≥, the Exosphere in Las Vegas, and the Museum of Modern Art in New York. The lecture he gave was basically a review of his body of work, and that of his art and design studio, which is comprised of about 20 people.
